**IonSwitch, LLC** is a pure KVM/SSD VPS host that owns and operates our own network/ip space/servers.  We've been operating out of our flagship Seattle location since we started, and just added Dallas a year ago with public sales starting last month.   

We constantly pickup votes on the _Provider of the Year_ awards.

We are offering 20% off reoccurring monthly rates with the code **LET2020-JAN-20PCTOFF**.

January Special:  Double Storage (up to 20GB) on any VPS purchase.  Just open a support case and reference this offer.  

**Terms**
- [No SMTP](https://clients.ionswitch.com/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=3) unless you super-promise not to SPAM, and are sending at a low rate (<50 emails a day). 
- Free BGP on annual purchases (currently Seattle only)
- All offers stack with our annual 17% off (two month free) for even MORE savings [excl. VPS512].
- We want you to be happy.  We have a clear refund policy in our Terms of Service, but with a reasonable discussion we can generally work out pro-rated refunds where needed beyond that window.  I've never said "no" to a reasonable request.
- Every VPS has a dedicated CPU allocation [as defined in our knowledge base](https://clients.ionswitch.com/index.php?rp=/knowledgebase/5/CPU-Resource-Policy.html).  This ensures we do not over-sell our systems.
